column3: “The G13xBlueberry Headband from Advanced Farm & Garden is an indicia dominant hybrid that has a sweet blueberry and earthy scent. Burned smooth and clean, and vape was even smoother. Sweet berry flavor with uplifting and calming effect. Worked great for stress and dulled some chronic back pain (L4S5, for the record), but keep a drink within reach and make no plans to go out and engage the public in conversation. Also...”

“Canadian strain called Zedd's Dead, is a potent cross between Northern Lights  and  OG Kush, this concentrate is the best sleep/pain medication ever, i was having a brutal night last night and this helped me drift off to sleep”
“Probably one of my favorite strains. It calmed my anxiety and was very relaxing. Smells great as well and didn’t have a bad come down.”
“Pain killer just like aspirin stronger but no worries”
“Helps with minor aches and pains and general relaxing”
“Gotta love some of that mellow yellow from up north Georgian Bay weed tastes great hits better and is like the muskoka brewing of kush”
“Not sure how I like this yer. Has some high. Tequila woodsy after taste. It creeps up slow and calm.”
